allow:
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ git commit -m "Cleanup: Remove unnecessary files and directories

Removed:
- .claude/ directory (Claude Code settings)
- utils/ directory (utility scripts)
- PROBLEM_DESCRIPTION.md (documentation)
- __pycache__/ directories (Python cache)
- *.pyc files (compiled Python files)
- logs/*.log files (log files)

Added:
- .gitignore file to prevent tracking of unnecessary files

Project now contains only essential source code and configuration files.")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Resolve merge conflicts from bedffaf

Removed all merge conflict markers (<<<<<<< HEAD, =======, >>>>>>> bedffaf)
from the following files:

- main.py: Resolved asyncio event loop handling and model training conflicts
- graph.py: Clean version without conflict markers
- state.py: Clean version without conflict markers
- langraph_agents/base_agent.py: Clean version without conflict markers
- langraph_agents/agents/goal_planning_agent.py: Resolved model loading conflicts
- langraph_agents/agents/risk_assessment_agent.py: Resolved model loading conflicts
- ml/training/predict_goal_success.py: Resolved imports and train_goal_model conflicts
- ml/training/predict_risk_profile.py: Resolved imports and train_risk_model conflicts
- config/logging_config.py: Clean version without conflict markers
- config/settings.py: Clean version without conflict markers

Chose the HEAD version for most conflicts as it includes better error handling
and platform-specific compatibility improvements. All files are now ready for
production use without conflict markers.

EOF
)")
